thread.section_title: Mabel's Labels Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mabel's Labels | mabelslabels.com
thread.title: Kendra

author: Kendra
title: Kendra
text:
I really like that this product helps support underfunded public schools in BC. Labels were easy to purchase online and arrived within the timeframe outlined.
However, in terms of packages, it would be nice to have more options, both in combinations (i.e. different sizes and shapes) and colours. This is based on the experience I had with the previous company we ordered labels from.
